KadoDialogue: ^KADO: Careful now! The bridgeway is quite slippery, if you keep moving that fast you may just fall face-first!
^CIELLE: Oh! Thank you for the tip… I was wondering why the bridge is so wet!
^KADO: That’s quite alright. Us Awafe love the water so we’re not bothered by it! Are you two heading to the temple to pay your respects to the great spirit of the Cove?
^COSMO: The who the what now? Awafe? Great Cove Spirit? Respects?
^KADO: Oh my, will this be your first time visiting our temple?
TheRest: ^KADO: Ah! Us Awafe are a water tribe consisting of Navemar that look like myself, and Marquina! A great spirit resides in this cove and every day we offer our respects to them.
^COSMO: Wow a water spirit lives here? Cielle, maybe the spirit can bless you with a shower…
^KADO: Well I won’t hold you up any longer! Head over towards the temple!
